data.name: buckaroo-pm/pkg-config-gtk-3.0
data.description: Buck wrapper for gtk+-3.0 managed by pkg-config
data.readme:
# pkg-config-gtk-3.0

Buck wrapper for gtk+-3.0 managed by `pkg-config`. 

To run the demo: 

```bash=
buck run demo/
```

versions.buck:
pkg_config = read_config('pkg_config', 'path', 'pkg-config')

pkg_package = 'gtk+-3.0'

genrule(
  name = 'preprocessor-flags', 
  out = 'out.txt', 
  cmd = pkg_config + ' ' + pkg_package + ' --cflags > $OUT', 
)

genrule(
  name = 'linker-flags', 
  out = 'out.txt', 
  cmd = pkg_config + ' ' + pkg_package + ' --libs > $OUT', 
)

prebuilt_cxx_library(
  name = 'gtk-3.0', 
  header_namespace = '', 
  header_only = True, 
  exported_preprocessor_flags = [
    '@$(location :preprocessor-flags)', 
  ], 
  exported_linker_flags = [
    '@$(location :linker-flags)', 
  ], 
  visibility = [
    'PUBLIC', 
  ], 
)
